{{Wiktionary|gibbon}} A '''[[gibbon]]''' is a type of ape.
'''Gibbon''' may also refer to: * [[Gibbon, Minnesota]], United States * [[Gibbon, Nebraska]], United States * [[Gibbon, Oregon]], United States * [[Gibbon (comics)]], a character in Marvel Comics' Spider-Man titles * Gibbon, a [[Death Eater#Death Eaters and their crimes|Death Eater]] character in ''Harry Potter'' * [[Ray Gibbon Drive]], St. Albert, Canada
==People with the surname== *[[Edward Gibbon]] (1737â1794), English historian and MP *[[Edward Gibbon Wakefield]] (1796â1862), British politician *[[Edward Howard-Gibbon]] (1799â1849), English surgeon, lawyer, and officer of arms *[[Lewis Grassic Gibbon]] (1901â1935), Scottish writer *[[Ray Gibbon]] (died 1999), former mayor of St. Albert, Canada *[[Roger Gibbon]] (born 1944), track cyclist from Trinidad and Tobago *William [[Monk Gibbon]] (1896â1987), Irish poet and prolific author
==See also== *[[Gibbons]], a surname *[[Gutsy Gibbon]], a release of Ubuntu * "Funky Gibbon", a song by [[The Goodies]]
